payload.description: Create haptics.js utility for Web Vibration API wrapper. Include light(), medium(), heavy(), success(), and error() functions with appropriate vibration patterns. Export as named exports.
payload.context: Part of mobile UX foundation. Uses Web Vibration API (navigator.vibrate). Light=10ms, medium=25ms, heavy=50ms, success=[10,50,10], error=[50,50,50]. Should check if 'vibrate' in navigator before calling.
